member.name: T:EM4325.EM4325Tag
member.summary: The class representing a tag using the EM4325 chip.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.USERMEM_DW_SIZE
member.summary: User memory size in DWORDs (32-bit unsigned).

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.PROPRIETARY_BITS
member.summary: Number of bits in a proprietary/custom command.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MIN_WRITETIMEOUT
member.summary: Minimum value for write operations' timeout in ms.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MIN_READTIMEOUT
member.summary: Minimum value for read operations' timeout in ms.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MAX_TIMEOUT
member.summary: Maximum timeout valur for read and write operations in ms.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CMD_GET_UID
member.summary: Get UID as specified by the EM4325 datasheet.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.RESPLEN_ALLOC_E0
member.summary: Expected number of bytes in UID response with allocation class E0.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.RESPLEN_ALLOC_E3
member.summary: Expected number of bytes in UID response with allocation class E3.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.RESPLEN_ALLOC_E2
member.summary: Expected number of bytes in UID response with allocation class E2.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MAX_SPI_RESPBYTES
member.summary: Maximum bytes in the SPI response.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MAX_SPI_SCLK
member.summary: Two bits for the SPI clock definition.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MAX_SPI_INITDELAY
member.summary: Two bits for the initial SCLK.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.MAX_SPI_BYTEDELAY
member.summary: Two bits for the delay time between bytes.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetBAP
member.summary: Return current state of the BAP enable.
member.returns: True if the BAP omde is enabled.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetSensorData(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true then the tag is instructed to backscatter the UID as a part of the response.
If true then a new sample is requested. Otherwise the tag is instructed to backscatter the last sample.
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetLastSample
member.summary: Simple read of the last sample without including the UID.
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetNewSample
member.summary: Simple read of a new sample without including the UID.
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetLastSampleValue
member.summary: Simple read of the last sample value only; no UTC or UID.
member.returns: An unsigned integer representing the tag bacskcattered last sample value.
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetNewSampleValue
member.summary: Simple read of a new sample value only; no UTC or UID.
member.returns: An unsigned integer representing the tag bacskcattered new sample value.
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetTempReading(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the sensor data by using standard read sequence.
member.param: Whether to get new sample or last stored sample.
member.returns: The temperature as a float (in Celsius) if successful.

remarks.para: The return value is -100.0 if the first read exchange fails.
The return value is -200.0 if the second read exchange fails.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.mEPC
member.summary: Tag's EPC. The tag is addressed by this EPC value whenever accessed.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.mPassword
member.summary: Set to password value for tag access if needed.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.mSecured
member.summary: Is set to true then the access password is used.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.#ctor(NurApiDotNet.NurApi.Tag)
member.param: A tag object that is received e.g. from an inventory.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.Stop
member.summary: Stop all by writing the control words to zero except for the enabled reset alarms bit which is set to '1'.
member.exception: Exception can be thrown after a communication error with the tag.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ReadUserBytes
member.returns: Return byte array containing user data.
member.exception: Exception thrown upon read error.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ReadUserUshort
member.returns: Return array of unsigned 16-bit integers from user memory in correct endian.
member.exception: Exception thrown upon read error.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ReadUserUint
member.returns: Return array of unsigned 32-bit integers from user memory in correct endian.
member.exception: Exception thrown upon read error.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.BitToBool(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retru nwhether a specific bit in an integer value is 0 or 1.
member.returns: If bit is '1' ther eturn value is true.
member.exception: Exception is thrown if the bit requested is less than 0 or greater than 31.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetConfigData
member.summary: Read configuration from the tag and interpret.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SetConfigData(EM4325.EM4325Tag.ConfigData,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true then the command is composed as a simple setup.
If false then a normal word-by-word write is used, otherwise G2 BlockWrite is used.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SetUTC(System.UInt32)
member.param: UTC value as an unsigned 32-bit integer.
member.exception: Exception is thrown upon tag or reader communication error.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetUTC
member.returns: 32-bit unsigned integer representing the UTC value.
member.exception: Exception is thrown upon tag or reader communication error.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.TEMP_STEP_PER_BIT
member.summary: Temperature value in C defining the step value per bit.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.BoolToUint(System.Boolean)
member.returns: 1 if b is true, zero otherwise.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.BuildDefault(System.UInt16,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true then the reader's AFE shall behave like the reponse is to a write (longer timeout etc.).
Whether to strip the handle from the response or not.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.InterpretUIDResponse(NurApiDotNet.NurApi,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Interpret the UID response data received from the tag.
member.param: NUR API handle. Used for user log trace/debug.
Actual length of the resposen. Needed if the UID is a part of another reponse.
member.exception: Throws an exception if the allocation class is not recognized.

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.GetUID
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: M:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ResetAlarms
member.returns: Returns true if tag indicated a successful alarm reset, false otherwise.
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
member.remarks: Does not throw exception when tag replies with an error. Use the API's logging event to capture more information.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.BAPCtlEnabled
member.summary: Enable/disable BAP mode control or get control enable state.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.BAPModeEnabled
member.summary: Get BAP mode, set BAP mode on/off.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.Sensor
member.summary: Attribyte used to read seonsor value from the tag.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.Temperature
member.summary: Get a new sample and return the temperature value.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ReadTimeout
member.summary: Set/get the current read timeout value in ms.
member.exception: Exception is thrown when the value is out of range.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.WriteTimeout
member.summary: Set/get the current write timeout value in ms.
member.exception: Exception is thrown when the value is out of range.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.Configuration
member.summary: Attribute used to read the configuration from the tag.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.UTC
member.summary: Return the UTC as an unsigned 32-bit integer.

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.UID
member.exception: Exception is thrown with module or tag communication error.
Exception is thrown if the response array indexing is out of range.
Is thrown with an invalid response (length or allocation class).

member.name: P:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CanResetAlarms
member.summary: Get whether this tag can reset alarms or not.

member.name: T:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig
member.summary: Structure that represents the simple sensor configuration.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.type
member.summary: Type bits' value as specified by the EM4325 specification.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.span
member.summary: Span interpretation depends whether the temperature span is set to 14 or 28.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.acc
member.summary: Accuracy value as specified by the EM4325 specification. Value is -acc to +acc.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.regime
member.summary: Sampling regime as specified by the EM4325 specification. NOTE: value is 'float.NaN' if the field is RFU.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.highLimit
member.summary: High in-range limit as specified by the EM4325 specification.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.lowRange
member.summary: Low in-range limit as specified by the EM4325 specification.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.monDelay
member.summary: Monitor delay as specified by the EM4325 specification.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.hiLimDelay
member.summary: Number of consecutive samples for high alarm as specified by the EM4325 specification.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SSDConfig.loLimDelay
member.summary: Number of consecutive samples for low alarm as specified by the EM4325 specification.

member.name: T:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CustomConfig
member.summary: Structure representing the custom configuration data.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CustomConfig.nrUnderTemp
member.summary: Number of consecutive under temperature samples required for alarm.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CustomConfig.nrOverTemp
member.summary: Number of consecutive over temperature samples required for alarm.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CustomConfig.delayUnits
member.summary: The delay unit type. 0 = 1 second 1 = 1 minute 2 = 1 hour 3 = sampling interval

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.CustomConfig.intvalUnits
member.summary: Sampling interval units 0 = 1 second 1 = 1 minute 2 = 1 hour 3 = 5 seconds

member.name: T:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ConfigData
member.summary: Structure representing the configuration data; either simple or custom.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ConfigData.simpleSensor
member.summary: Whether the configuration is custom sensor (0, false) or simple sensor (1/true).

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ConfigData.resetEn
member.summary: If true then the reset alarms is enabled.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ConfigData.tsRequired
member.summary: If true then the time stamp is required for each sample.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.ConfigData.raw
member.summary: Raw data bytes from the tag.

member.name: T:EM4325.EM4325Tag.UIDResponse
member.summary: Response structure for the GetUID command.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.UIDResponse.allocClass
member.summary: The allocation class aas specified by the EM4325 specification (E0, E2, E3).

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.UIDResponse.CRC16
member.summary: CRC-16 for legacy TOTAL. -1 means 'not present'.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SensorData.hasUid
member.summary: If true then the uid field is valid.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SensorData.uid
member.summary: The interpreted UID data from the tag if requested.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SensorData.raw
member.summary: Raw byte data from the tag.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SensorData.data
member.summary: The 32-bit unsigned integer from the tag.

member.name: F:EM4325.EM4325Tag.SensorData.utc
member.summary: The 32-bit unsigned integer prepresenting the UTC value.

member.name: T:EM4325.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The EM4325 namespace contains classes for tags with the EM4325 chip. Supported products:
